subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Paris Saint-Germain, newly wealthy after being bought by a Qatari royal, will show off its new team against Lorient, while the Milan teams are in Beijing to play a money-spinning cup game.
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain, newly wealthy after being bought by a Qatari royal, will show off its new team against Lorient, while the Milan teams are in Beijing to play a money-spinning cup game.
